primarySegments.name: Young Urban Professionals
primarySegments.description: Tech-savvy individuals living in urban areas who prioritize personal safety and quick access to emergency services.

problemsNeeds: Need quick access to emergency help
Desire to feel safe in urban environments
behaviors: Likely to share app with friends
Engage with app during travel or late hours

primarySegments.name: Parents of Teenagers
primarySegments.description: Parents who are concerned about the safety of their teenage children, especially when they are not at home.

problemsNeeds: Need peace of mind regarding children's safety
Desire a quick way for children to alert them in emergencies
behaviors: Encourage children to use safety apps

primarySegments.name: Elderly Living Independently
primarySegments.description: Older adults who live alone and require an easy-to-use emergency alert system for personal safety.

problemsNeeds: Need a simple way to call for help
behaviors: Use app for peace of mind
